title: High-End Seasonal Menu
system_mod: Elevate tone and culinary vocabulary slightly. Avoid gimmicky drinks or overuse of obscure modifiers. Assume jiggering and guest storytelling are expected.
venue_context: A chef-driven venue with a high-touch guest experience wants a seasonal cocktail menu that feels curated and refined. They expect premium pricing and strong storytelling.
prompt: We want a high-end seasonal menu that feels curated and aligns with a chef-driven concept. What cocktails and strategies should we use?
